page.title: 01SUMMARY-DENTON VILLAGE
page.content: Denton is a small{rural community}in south Norfolk,with a steady population of about 375.There has been a{settle- {ment}on the site for many years,but currently building is restricted. The earliest houses were built about 1650, the newest about 1965.Most homes have modern{conveniences}including telephone & television:all keep a pet. Roads are narrow & all homes run at least one car.Though surrounded by farms,there is little local work now; small businesses are flourishing however.Denton is a thriving{village} with a close community spirit illust- rated by the number of organisations & clubs-all well supported.Entertain- ment is mainly locally organised. There is an even age distribution,& quite a few babies have been born recently,which ensures the future of the village in years to come.
